org.apache.ignite.mesos

Class ClusterProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.mesos.ClusterProperties

  • public class ClusterProperties
extends Object
    The class defines cluster configuration. This configuration created from properties file that passed on startup or environment variables.

    If Mesos cluster working in Intranet or behind NAT then an access to local resources can be set by ignitePackagePath() or ignitePackageUrl() which should be available from nodes.

      • idleTimeout

        public long idleTimeout()
        Sets the maximum Idle time for a http connection, which will be used for jetty server. The server provides resources for ignite mesos framework such as ignite archive, user's libs, configurations and etc.
        Returns:
        Http server idle timeout.

      • ignitePackageUrl

        public String ignitePackageUrl()
        URL to ignite package. The URL should to point at valid apache ignite archive. This property can be useful if using own apache ignite build.
        Returns:
        Url to ignite package.

      • ignitePackagePath

        public String ignitePackagePath()
        Path on local file system to ignite archive. That can be useful when Mesos working in Intranet or behind NAT.
        Returns:
        Path on local host to ignite package.

      • igniteConfigUrl

        public String igniteConfigUrl()
        Returns:
        Url to ignite configuration.

        public String usersLibsUrl()
        Returns:
        Url to users libs configuration.

      • getNonLoopbackAddress

        public static String getNonLoopbackAddress()
                                    throws SocketException
        Finds a local, non-loopback, IPv4 address
        Returns:
        The first non-loopback IPv4 address found, or null if no such addresses found
        Throws:
        SocketException - If there was a problem querying the network interfaces
